name: Game&watch treasure
description:
These fan games are a tribute to Game & Watch games. All right are reserved to their respective owners. 

This is a  demo preview of my new project. I wanted to mix various universes together and match these with the Game&Watch gameplay and do my best to achieve a good result. I hope that you'll have a good time on this fan game .

For the moment only one gameplay is available but the others will come soon ;)

This demo contain a gallery mode.

----------------------------------------------

Controls : 

TAB to reset game

Spacebar to validate or launch games

Use arrow to move

----------------------------------------------

Feel free to give any feedbacks

You can follow my personnals creations here : https://www.artstation.com/lucavvenire
